text: Vy ne zdiysnyuyete hrikh oholoshuyuchy vashu diyal聞nist聞 do zhinok, abo keeping tse tayemnytsya. BOH znaye shcho vy podumayete pro nykh. Ne zustriyte yikh sekretno, yakshcho ne vy mayete shchos聞 spravedlyve obhovoryty. Ne consummate shlyub doky yikh tymchasovyy vykonuyet聞sya. Vy musyte znaty shcho BOH znaye vashi nayhlybshi dumky, ta zauvazhuyete Yoho. Vy musyte znaty shcho BOH Forgiver, Clement
